translations: v．作诗，押韵：将文字、故事或思想转化为诗歌或押韵的形式。
· He spent his free time versifying his thoughts and experiences.
他在空闲时间里将自己的思想和经历诗化。

sentences.sentence: Later, some forms of communication poems such as the serial versifying, the same topic poems, joint poem sentences were in bud and blossom.
sentences.translation: 后世诗歌交往的一些形式如唱和诗、同题诗、联句等开始萌芽、孕育。
